ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing

Class BranchSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.DrawHandle
      • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.BranchSlider

  • public class BranchSlider
extends DrawHandle
    A DrawHandle that allows a user to "slide" an RNA branch (i.e. a helix and everything on one side of it.) along the smooth arc of the circular loop at the helix's base.
